question.text: Which of the following should you NOT do at the scene of a collision?

explanation.text: Keeping casualties or witnesses calm is important, but never offer a cigarette because of the risk of fire. Bear in mind they may be in shock. Don’t offer an injured person anything to eat or drink. They may have internal injuries or need surgery.

answer.text: Warn other traffic by switching on your hazard warning lights
Offer someone a cigarette to calm them down
Ask drivers to switch off their engines
